@graph.name: Max Cube per Route - Volume Constraint for Fleet Management - Route4Me
@graph.description: Optimize delivery routes with volume constraints. Set maximum cubic capacity for each vehicle to ensure efficient loading and prevent overloading while maintaining customer service levels.
@graph.keywords: route optimization, volume constraints, cubic capacity, fleet management, delivery route planning, vehicle capacity optimization, logistics planning, route planning software, maximum cube per route, delivery constraints, cargo optimization, vehicle loading, efficient routing, load planning, logistics efficiency

@graph.name: Maximum Cube Constraint for Route Optimization
@graph.description: The Maximum Cube per Route feature streamlines logistics operations by automatically accounting for cubic volume constraints during route planning. This solution eliminates the complexity of manual planning by allowing dispatchers to simply input customer addresses and set volume limitations for each vehicle. Within minutes, Route4Me generates optimized routes that respect these cubic capacity constraints while factoring in traffic, customer availability windows, and other critical variables. Perfect for delivery fleets managing packages of varying sizes, this feature ensures vehicles are properly loaded without exceeding capacity limits, preventing delays and errors that could impact customer satisfaction and operational efficiency.
